tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE risk_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_type VARCHAR(50),
  risk_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE trading_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_type VARCHAR(50),
    trade_amount DECIMAL,
    risk_score INT,
    operation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TradeOperations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT NOT NULL,
    operation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trade_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Exposure (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_id INT NOT NULL,
    risk_metric_id INT NOT NULL,
    exposure_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TradeExposure (
    exposure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT,
    trade_date DATE,
    exposure_amount DECIMAL,
    currency VARCHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE TradingOperations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_type VARCHAR(50),
    operation_date DATE,
    operation_amount DECIMAL,
    operation_currency VARCHAR(3)
);
